message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_OBLIGATION_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Obligation already exists.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_NO_RULESET_DEFINED
message.locale: The %1c is not associated with a funding rule set.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_NO_FUNDS_AVAILABLE_FOR_FUND_RELATED_TYPE_FOR_PERIOD
message.locale: No funds available for this %1c for the specified period.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_FUND_CANNOT_BE_OBLIGATED_FUND_FISCAL_YEAR_CLOSED
message.locale: The fund fiscal year is closed, the obligation cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_AMOUNT_NOT_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_ZERO
message.locale: The Obligation amount must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_OBLIGATION_CANNOT_BE_CREATED_FFY_HAS_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS
message.locale: The fund fiscal year has insufficient funds, the obligation cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_OBLIGATION_CANNOT_BE_CREATED_FFY_HAS_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS_CANNOT_BE_OVER_OBLIGATED
message.locale: The fund fiscal year has insufficient funds and cannot be over obligated or wait listed, the obligation cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_AMOUNT_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Amount must be entered.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_START_DATE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Start Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_END_DATE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: End Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_OBLIGATION_RELATED_ID_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Obligation Related ID must be entered.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_OBLIGATION_RELATED_TYPE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Obligation Related Type must be entered..

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_CASE_PARTICIPANT_ROLE_ID_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Case Participant Role ID must be entered.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_INVALID_OBLIGATION_RELATED_ID
message.locale: Obligation Related ID is invalid.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_INVALID_CASE_PARTICIPANT_ROLE_ID
message.locale: Case Participant Role ID is invalid.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_NO_FUNDS_AVAILABLE_FOR_FUND_RELATED_TYPE
message.locale: There are no funds available for this %1c.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_AMOUNT_NOT_GREATER_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The obligation amount must be positive and not equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_FUND_FISCAL_YEAR_DOES_NOT_EXIST_OBLIGATION_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The fund fiscal year does not exist for the fund. The obligation cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_FUND_ID_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The fund ID must be entered.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_FV_INVALID_FUND_ID
message.locale: The Fund ID is invalid.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XFV_STARTDATE_SHOULD_NOT_BE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Start Date should not be after the End Date.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XFV_OBLIGATION_DOES_NOT_EXIST_FOR_RELATED_TYPE
message.locale: Obligation does not exist for the %1c.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_FUND_FISCAL_YEAR_DOES_NOT_EXIST_OBLIGATION_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: Fund fiscal year does not exist for the obligation date, %1d. The obligation cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_OBLIGATION_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_FUND_FISCAL_YEAR_CLOSED
message.locale: The fund fiscal year is closed, the obligation cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_OBLIGATION_XRV_FUND_FISCAL_YEAR_HAS_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS_CANNOT_BE_OVER_OBLIGATED_OBLIGATION_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: The fund fiscal year has insufficient funds and cannot be over obligated, the obligation cannot be updated.
